Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, I just wanted to tell everyone about my YouTube channel I'm starting up. My YouTube channel doesn't have any videos YET but I'm going to start uploading videos on the weekends I will be playing KSP of course, and I will also be playing games like ARMA II, ARMA IIOA, Garry's Mod, Minecraft and more if other games are suggested. I'm just asking you guys to subscribe or wait until i start uploading to consider subscribing, dont flame for asking I'm just trying to get a YouTube channel started, Thanks.

My Channel: https://www.youtube.com/user/TheCorruptInfinity

My first video is going to be about a hang glider in KSP.

Not gonna flame you for advertising (Hell I would do it myself if I thought there was anything really worth sharing) But it would probably be better off in the fanart section (We did have a YouTube sub forum for it but it went bye bye with the forum rollback)
